name: RPGTest2
description:
RPGTest is a roguelike game developed in Java 9 using LWJGL3.

The goal of the game is to clear every room of the dungeon.

There are 144 rooms in total and most of them will contain enemies inside.

When you clear every room, you are greeted with a winning screen and by pressing enter you exit the game.

If you die, you'll be greeted instead with a losing screen from which you'll also exit the game by pressing enter.
